column3: Make a mountain out of sand, put it on top, and break the mountain so that it doesn't\n。\nLosing the person who has defeated it！

column2: 砂山崩し！

column2: 確かに。\nじゃあ次は私だけど、\n三玖とは逆に、ここは大胆に行こっかな。

column4: Certamente。\nBem, então eu sou o próximo, mas ao contrário de\nSanku, aqui vamos corajosamente。

column2: 絶対に！　お前に回してやる。\nとはいえ、ここからどう砂を取るべきか……。
column3: Absolutely！ I'm going to give it to you\n, but how should we remove sand from here……。
column4: Absolutamente！ Eu vou te dar\n, mas como devemos remover a areia daqui……。
